sentence: He is supporting Herschel Walker for Senate in Georgia and David McCormick for Senate in Pennsylvania.
author: Virginia Aabram
title: Pompeo endorses Rep. Ronny Jackson for reelection in Texas

sentence: GEORGIA ON MY MIND: Now that HERSCHEL WALKER has officially picked up the GOP nomination in the closely watched Georgia Senate race, both parties are watching everything the candidate says in much harsher light.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Trumps new obsession
